content.query:
create view dim_course as
SELECT m.[id] as course_id
,[category]
,[sortorder]
,[fullname]
,[shortname]
,[idnumber]
,[summary]
,[summaryformat]
,[format]
,[showgrades]
,[newsitems]
,[startdate]
,[enddate]
,[relativedatesmode]
,[marker]
,[maxbytes]
,[legacyfiles]
,[showreports]
,[visible]
,[visibleold]
,[downloadcontent]
,[groupmode]
,[groupmodeforce]
,[defaultgroupingid]
,[lang]
,[calendartype]
,[theme]
,[timecreated]
,[timemodified]
,[requested]
,[enablecompletion]
,[completionnotify]
,[cacherev]
,[originalcourseid]
,[showactivitydates]
,[showcompletionconditions]
,[AcademicYearSessionId]
,[ExternalId]
,[FirstSeenDateTime]
,[IsActiveInSession]
,[LastSeenDateTime]
,[Name]
,[OrganizationId]
,[SourceSystemId]
 FROM ldb_dev_s2r_moodle_v4p1.dbo.course as m
 left outer join ldb_dev_s2r_m365_v1p4p0.dbo.course as i
    on m.category=i.id
